paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses variants in various genes associated with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, including a specific mention of the TTR gene variant p.Val50Met, which is associated with transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: A second case with the disease-causing variant TTR: p.Val50Met has been reported with transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.additional_notes: Only one case of the TTR variant was reported.
key_quotes: A second case with the disease-causing variant TTR: p.Val50Met has been reported with transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper specifically mentioned the TTR variant.
